overview: The friendship of four young men namely Ali, Anton, Yusuf and Imron who are still single alias singles. In fact, they are approaching the age of three. One day, Ali suffers from venustraphobia, which is a mental disorder that causes sufferers to always panic when they meet the opposite sex. She is forced to find a way to get married soon because of her father's threat. Ali's three best friends, who have various other problems related to marriage, then make various efforts to help Ali find a life partner. Ali also met several women with unique and astonishing backgrounds. One of them is Annisa, who has a past that is closely related to the trauma that Ali experienced.
title: Jomblo Fi Sabilillah
